title: Language Detection with REST API, Lambda and Comprehend using Javascript
description: Create a REST API with  Lambda backend that calls Comprehend service for language detection using AWS Javscript v3 SDK.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern shows how to deploy a SAM template that builds a REST API with  Lambda function (as a back end integration) which calls Amazon Comprehend for detecting the dominant language in a text using AWS Javascript v3 SDK.

bullets.text: Scale Up Language Detection with Amazon Comprehend and S3 Batch Operations

text: See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
